actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation.

official_title: To direct the Secretary of Transportation to convey to the Montauk Historical Society Light Station located at Montauk, New York.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Transportation to convey all right, title, and interest of the United States in Light Station Montauk Point, New York, to the Montauk Historical Association, New York.

titles.title: To direct the Secretary of Transportation to convey to the Montauk Historical Society Light Station located at Montauk, New York.
